thread.title: PLAN YOUR WEEKEND | New Year's Eve, farmers markets, KSU bowl game and more | Area | themercury.com
thread.title_full: PLAN YOUR WEEKEND | New Year's Eve, farmers markets, KSU bowl game and more | Area | themercury.com

author: Emily Porter Contributing writer
title: PLAN YOUR WEEKEND | New Year's Eve, farmers markets, KSU bowl game and more | Area | themercury.com
text:
Celebrate the end of the year and the beginning of the next this Sunday.
Throughout town, several bars and local businesses will be hosting celebratory events to say goodbye to 2023 and ring in 2024. As usual, the little apple ball drop will be held in Aggieville at midnight.
Business hours may vary Sunday and Monday. There will be no newspaper on Monday.
Here’s a look at some local events in the area this weekend.
THURSDAY
K-State Football vs NC State, 4:45 p.m.
Watch, listen, live stats: ESPN, K-State Sports Network, kstatesports.com .
Orlando, Florida.
BINGO, 7 p.m.
Tickets: liquidartwinery.com .
Liquid Art Winery, 1745 Wildcat Creek Road.
FRIDAY
Paint and Sip: Peace N Love Bug, 6 p.m.
Also Paint and Sip: Hoar Frost at 6 p.m. Saturday.
Uncorked Inspiration, 1223 Moro St.
FriYay! Pick Your Project Workshop, 6 p.m.
Also Saturday Crafternoon Party at 2 p.m. Saturday.
Tickets: boardandbrush.com/manhattan/ . Bring your own beverage.
Board and Brush, 311 Fort Riley Blvd.
Christmas Dinner and Movie Night: Love Actually, 7 p.m.
Tickets: liquidartwinery.com .
Liquid Art Winery, 1745 Wildcat Creek Road.
SATURDAY
MHK Community Market, 9 a.m.-1 p.m.
American Legion.
Manhattan Farmers Market, 9 a.m.-1 p.m.
Third and Leavenworth streets.
Winery Tour, noon-2 p.m.
Tickets: liquidartwinery.com .
Liquid Art Winery, 1745 Wildcat Creek Road.
K-State Women’s Basketball at Cincinnati, 1 p.m.
Watch, listen, live stats: Big 12 Now on ESPN+, K-State Sports Network, kstatesports.com .
Cincinnati, Ohio.
SUNDAY
Namaste MHK, 10:30 a.m.
Manhattan Brewing Company, 406 Poyntz Ave.
New Year’s Eve Matinee Show with Wasted Youth 785, 1:30 p.m.
No cost, all ages.
Sisters of Sound Records, 1214 Moro St.
Holiday Dinner and Movie Night: When Harry Met Sally, 5 p.m.
Also Speakeasy: New Year’s Eve Celebration at 9 p.m.
Tickets: liquidartwinery.com .
Liquid Art Winery, 1745 Wildcat Creek Road.
Family New Year’s Eve, 6-8:30 p.m.
Food, music, and balloon drop at 8 p.m. All children must be accompanied by an adult.
Tickets: $18+, flinthillsdiscovery.org , in person, or 785-587-2726.
Flint Hills Discovery Center, 315 S. Third St.
NYE at MBC, 7 p.m.-12:30 a.m.
Manhattan Brewing Company, 406 Poyntz Ave.
NYE Event, 7 p.m.-midnight.
Balloon drop, midnight toast, prizes and more.
Tickets: $25, https://leaptrampolinepark.com/manhattan/
Leap, 3011 Anderson Ave.
New Year’s Eve, 8 p.m.
Prizes every half hour starting at 9 p.m.
Bottlecaps, 3043 Anderson Ave.
Little Apple New Year’s Eve, 8 p.m.-2 a.m.
Aggieville.
New Year’s Eve Celebration, 8 p.m.-1 a.m.
Featuring the band Mothers Worry.
RC McGraw’s, 2317 Tuttle Creek Blvd.
New Year’s Eve Party, 9 p.m.
DJ Papa Dom and the Box Turtles will perform. Champagne toast at midnight.
Finn’s Neighborhood Pub, 317 Poyntz Ave.
New Year’s Eve Pajama Party, 9 p.m.
Champagne toast at midnight, 21+ to enter.
Tickets: $15+, mhkentertainmentco.com/product/New-Years-Pajama-Party/25 .
Manhattan Entertainment Co., 3236 Kimball Ave.
AMP NYE Party, 10 p.m.-2 a.m.
Champagne toast included with cover charge.
Tickets: $5, auntiemaes.com .
Auntie Mae’s Parlor, 616 N. 12th St.
